verse: रमाकान्तं कांतं भवभयभयान्तं भवसुखम् दुराशान्तं शान्तं निखिलहृदिभान्तं भुवनपम् विवादान्तं दान्तं दनुजनिचयान्तं सुचरितम् सदा तं गोविन्दं परमसुखकंदं भजत रे ॥
overall_meaning: O, worship Govinda, the beloved of Rama, attractive, remover of the fear of worldly existence, giver of worldly happiness, remover of difficulties, peaceful, illuminator of all hearts like the universe, ender of disputes, controlled, ender of enemies, well-practiced in righteous deeds, always the source of supreme happiness.
